# previewPixelBuffer

**Instance Property**

The pixel data for a preview-sized version of the photo, if requested.

## Declaration

```swift
var previewPixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer? { get }
```

## Discussion

If you requested a preview image by specifying the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoSettings/previewPhotoFormat] property of your photo settings when requesting capture, this property offers access to the resulting preview image pixel data. The pixel buffer contains only the minimal attachments required for correct display. If you did not request a preview image, this property’s value is `nil`.

## Accessing preview photo data

- **embeddedThumbnailPhotoFormat**: A dictionary describing the data format for a preview-sized image accompanying the captured photo.
